pullRequest.title: Add the ability update and set tracking codes

commit.message: added method to append tracking codes
Tests Added for Create, Read, Update

nodes.bodyText:
Could use return JsonObject.readFrom(this.trackingCodes.toString()).
https://www.javadoc.io/doc/com.eclipsesource.minimal-json/minimal-json/0.9.4/com/eclipsesource/json/JsonObject.html
Could simplify code a bit, but don't think it's necessary. Either way works for me.
